Index.title: A operating system based on Debian GNU/Linux
Index.description: Symbolizing %nimble and smooth ink%, we have created a efficiency and beautiful UI design for the system.
Index.badgeDescription: Lingmo OS have a user-friendly UI, as well as other features for you.
Index.featureInteractionsDescription: Lingmo OS has redesigned the entire system, optimized visual effects, and improved user experiences
Index.featureSecurityDescription: The underlying choice for Lingmo OS is the so-called "rock solid" Debian GNU/Linux, so Lingmo OS not only has aesthetic appeal but also stable characteristics
Index.featureUIDescription: Lingmo OS has relatively lower hardware requirements and a smooth experience on lower hardware
Index.featureMenuDescription: Lingmo OS has a global menu at the top with all functions you need, which can save your screen space

Downloads.title: Download Lingmo OS
Downloads.titleDescription: Get efficient and smooth experience out of the box with Lingmo OS
Downloads.latestDescription: The brand new 2.0 for Lingmo OS with Debian 12, as well as other features.
Downloads.requirementsMedia: USB stick larger than 4GB or DVD for installation media
Downloads.allDownloadsDescription: Currently, the iso is shared on the Sourceforge. Click %here% to get more info.
